idea: We developed an oral insulin tablet for diabetes patients who currently depend on insulin injections. The formulation has been developed and it is at the pre-clinical stage. We filed the patent and working towards to bring the technology into the market
name: NEELAGIL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
INDRA - Water Treatment

Our vision is to solve the toughest water and process challenges by helping industry and society meet increasing water demands, overcome scarcity challenges, enhance their environmental stewardship and comply with regulatory requirements thereby driving efficiency and collaboration.

Our product INDRA is a smart & robust water treatment system which can recycle domestic & industrial wastewater for reuse applications. Our innovation has helped in high efficiency, cost reduction & less space utilization.
name: INDRA
